Instructions

Pizza Recipe No Oven No Yeast ( This recipe makes 1 LARGE PIZZA, u can easily double or triple the recipe):

  • 140g Self Rising Flour ( 1 cup )
  • 140g Any plain Yogurt ( 5 ounces )

Substitutes

I highly recommend using yogurt and flour but if u can't find these here are the substitutes):

Yogurt can be substituted for milk BUT add only 85 grams of milk (1/3 cup) + 1/2 tsp vinegar or lemon juice.

Self rising flour can be made TWO ways:

  • 140 grams of plain flour + 1 1/2 tsp baking powder ( 1 cup + 1 1/2 tsp baking powder)
  • 140 grams of plain flour + 1/2 tsp baking soda ( 1 cup + 1/2 tsp baking soda)
